JOB DESCRIPTION: About the Role   Uber is seeking a TM1 (Planning Analytics) Engineer to join its Fintech Engineering group. This position is responsible for developing solutions built upon the Company's enterprise-wide financial planning analytics environment. This role also covers the administration, delivery and support of existing and future applications.   What you'll do   Design, development and maintenance of TM1 reporting, planning and forecasting models and data integrations    Understand end to end architecture and application support processes    Rotational on-call availability for critical systems support   What the Candidate Will Need / Bonus Points   At least 4 years of developing effective technical solutions within TM1, covering full spectrum of technical toolset:    Advanced TurboIntegrator Scripting    Advanced Rule and Feeder Development    Active Forms and PAW Report Development    TM1 Server Administration    Basic SQL competencies    MDX Query Scripting    Experience with Python or other scripting language is a bonus    Experience with REST API is a bonus    Experience with Linux is a bonus    Experience with Git or other version control is a bonus    Knowledge of Data warehouse and BI concepts    A Bachelor's Degree (BS/BA) in CS,Information Systems, Accounting, Finance or related business/technical field is required

EDUCATION.UG: Any Graduate in Any Specialization, B.A in Other Specialization
